questions.text: When the family watches the Millennium timeline show in the beginning of this episode, who is not recognized for passing away over the millennium?
questions.explanation:
John Lennon.

	The show was hosted by Diane Simmons and Tom Tucker and it outlined events occurring over the last millennium.

questions.text: Peter is offered a coupon from a man dressed in which of these?
questions.explanation:
Chicken suit.

	Peter breaks into a fight against a chicken because he gave Peter an expired coupon.  The fight literally lasts a minute and a half as Peter and the chicken guy fight all over Quahog.

questions.text: Where were Peter and Lois set to go for the New Year's party?
options: They were hosting their own party
questions.explanation:
Quagmire's.

	Everyone decided to go to Quagmires, but Peter kept the family home because of the Y2K scare.  They were unharmed by all of the disasters.

questions.text: Where was the Griffin family during midnight?
questions.explanation:
In the basement.

	Peter gets the whole family into the basement and the Y2K event occurs.  Luckily, the whole family was safe, and they could emerge from the basement the next morning.

questions.text: Cleveland and Quagmire were fused together during the holocaust.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Cleveland and Quagmire were fused together, and Joe's wheelchair melded him into his driveway.

questions.text: What is the name of Chris' tree?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Chris wants to bring his tree to Natick with the family, but Peter brings it into the house and shoots it.  Peter only thought it would be another mouth to feed.

questions.text: The Griffins move to Natick to find a factory that makes what food?
questions.explanation:
Twinkies.

	Peter states that only two things could survive a nuclear holocaust: Cockroaches and Twinkies.  Thus, the family heads to a Twinkie factory in Natick.

questions.text: What does Stewie grow from falling in toxic waste?
questions.explanation:
Tentacles.

	Stewie falls in toxic waste when the family arrives in Natick.  He soon grows tentacles and has an octopus' lifestyle.

questions.text: Who is the mayor of New Quahog?
questions.explanation:
Peter & Peter Griffin.

	Peter himself runs new Quahog.  He has horrible rules that everyone must follow, and he turns the pipe system of New Quahog into guns.

questions.text: What does the town do with the guns Peter had made?
questions.explanation:
They burn them.

	After exiling Peter and his family from new Quahog, the town burns the guns.  Unfortunately, many Stewie/Octopus creature swarm and kill everyone in the town.  Obviously, everything goes back to normal after this episode.
